mapper.insert:
insert into BOARD_REF(NUM, BOARDNUM, WRITER, CONTENT) values (BOARD_REF_SEQ.nextval, #{boardNum}, #{writer}, #{content})
select NVL(max(NUM),0) from BOARD_REF
mapper.update: update BOARD_REF set CONTENT=#{content}, MODDATE=sysdate where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from BOARD_REF where BOARDNUM=#{boardNum} order by REFNUM, DEPTH, NUM

select REFWRITER, BOARDWRITER from ( (select WRITER REFWRITER, BOARDNUM from BOARD_REF where NUM=#{num}) a inner join (select WRITER BOARDWRITER, NUM from BOARD where NUM=#{boardNum}) b on a.BOARDNUM = b.NUM )
